content: santa baby hat amethyst mermaidesigns get ready to deck the halls with this quick and festive project the santa baby hat is a fun addition to any holiday outfit the pattern is simple to allow for ultimate customization and is sized for the whole family we ll be using continuous rounds so no joining or turning you ll need a stitch marker so you can mark the beginning of your rounds 2 sizing suggestions below you ll find a chart of suggested sizings you can mix and match if you find that your hat is too big or small for the intended wearer within the pattern the sizes will be shown like
